level.text: No person shall act as physician in an event without a physician’s license issued pursuant to this chapter.
An applicant for a license as a physician under this chapter shall submit with the application:
Proof satisfactory to the Commission that the applicant is licensed to practice medicine in the District and is in good standing; and
A statement of the educational and professional experience of the applicant.
An applicant under this section shall complete a period of apprenticeship under a physician licensed by the Commission.

The Commission shall not grant a license to an applicant under this section unless it has received a recommendation of the chief physician concerning the applicant’s qualifications based on the applicant’s performance during the period of apprenticeship.
